Uses of Package
com.mimecast.robin.config.server

Packages that use com.mimecast.robin.config.server
Package
Description
com.mimecast.robin.config.server
Server-specific configuration files and their accessors.
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints
HTTP endpoints for monitoring and metrics.
com.mimecast.robin.main
The entry point and core components of the Robin application.
com.mimecast.robin.smtp
The heart of the Robin application, providing core SMTP client and server functionalities.
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.connection
Establishes and manages the underlying SMTP connection.
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.security
Implements security features for SMTP, such as TLS.
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.webhook
Manages the sending of SMTP-related events to webhook endpoints.
com.mimecast.robin.storage
Manages the storage of incoming emails for the server.
com.mimecast.robin.util
A collection of miscellaneous utility classes used throughout the Robin application.
